2016 2012 R2 installation configuration and troubleshooting DNS and DHCP configuration on Windows Server 2016 and 2012 R2 Involved in troubleshooting of DNS DHCP and other IP conflict problems DHCP File System and Print Server services on Windows 2008 R2 and Windows 2012 R2 hardware Configured backup servers of DHCP and Print server with regular BCP test For server security I was
